item.title: Verizon 警告称竞争激烈导致用户增长 "疲软"，股价下跌
item.description: Verizon 周二警告称，第一季度用户增长可能会 "疲软"，因为竞争对手运营商会通过促销活动吸引用户，这导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 5.3%。【原文：Verizon warned on Tuesday that first-quarter subscriber growth would likely be "soft" as rival carriers attract customers with promotions, sending its shares down 5.3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: Verizon 警告称竞争激烈导致用户增长 "疲软"，股价下跌
item.description: Verizon 周二警告称，第一季度用户增长可能会 "疲软"，因为竞争对手运营商会通过促销活动吸引用户，这导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 5.3%。【原文：Verizon warned on Tuesday that first-quarter subscriber growth would likely be "soft" as rival carriers attract customers with promotions, sending its shares down 5.3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 调查发现，法国科技初创企业破产数量不断增加
item.description: 本周二公布的一项调查显示，法国初创科技企业的破产数量正在增加，而这项调查的结果可能会损害埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统所树立的巴黎作为欧洲领先的科技中心和法国经济主要驱动力的形象。【原文：Bankruptcies in France's tech start-up sector are increasing, according to a survey published on Tuesday whose findings could undermine President Emmanuel Macron's image of Paris as a leading European tech hub and key driver of the French economy.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行前首席执行官斯塔利说他对爱泼斯坦的 "畸形活动 "一无所知
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）前老板杰斯-斯塔利（Jes Staley）周二表示，他对连环恋童癖杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的 "畸形活动 "一无所知，他在作证时试图推翻金融业对他与已故金融家关系的禁令。【原文：Ex-Barclays boss Jes Staley said on Tuesday he had no idea about serial paedophile Jeffrey Epstein's "monstrous activities", as he gave evidence to try to overturn a finance industry ban over his relationship with the late financier.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，安森基金关注 Match 的代理权争夺战，计划提名董事人选
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社，对冲基金 Anson Funds 正在为 Match Group 的董事会斗争做准备，并计划提名几位董事进入这家在线约会公司的 10 人董事会。【原文：Hedge fund Anson Funds is gearing up for a boardroom fight at Match Group and plans to nominate several directors to the online dating company's 10-member board, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国的 Manus AI 宣布与阿里巴巴的 Qwen 团队合作
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 Manus AI 周二宣布与阿里巴巴的 "问问 "人工智能模型背后的团队建立战略合作伙伴关系。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence start-up Manus AI announced on Tuesday a strategic partnership with the team behind Alibaba's Qwen AI models.】

item.title: 独家报道：梅赛德斯将与中国海赛激光雷达合作开发面向全球市场的智能汽车
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，梅赛德斯-奔驰将为全球市场开发配备海赛激光雷达传感器的智能驾驶汽车，这是外国汽车制造商首次寻求在中国以外销售的车型上使用这种中国制造的技术。【原文：Mercedes-Benz will develop smart driving cars for global markets equipped with Hesai's lidar sensors, a person with direct knowledge said, the first time a foreign automaker has sought to use such Chinese-made technology for models sold outside China.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司考虑在波兰建立潜在的 KC-390 总装线
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二表示，由于 KC-390 军用货机在欧洲的销售势头强劲，该公司正在考虑在波兰建立一条 KC-390 军用货机的总装线。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer is considering establishing a final assembly line for its KC-390 military cargo aircraft in Poland, it said on Tuesday amid strong sales momentum for the plane in Europe.】

item.title: 德意志交易所的 Clearstream 将提供比特币和以太币托管服务
item.description: 德国德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse）周二表示，将从下月起为机构客户提供加密货币托管和结算服务，成为最新一家为比特币和以太币提供托管管理的公司。【原文：Germany's Deutsche Boerse will offer cryptocurrency custody and settlement services for institutional clients from next month, the company said on Tuesday, becoming the latest firm to offer custody management for bitcoin and ether.】

item.title: 央行机构国际清算银行（BIS）呼吁市场支持欧洲国防开支激增
item.description: 央行机构国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）没有像往常一样对债务上升表示担忧，而是注意到市场对欧洲为应对美国安全政策转变而增加国防开支的计划做出了积极反应。【原文：Central bank body, the Bank for International Settlements, has refrained from voicing its usual concerns about rising debt, noting markets' positive reaction to Europe's plans to ramp up defence spending in response to U.S. security policy shifts.】

item.title: Celestial AI 融资 2.5 亿美元，希望加速人工智能芯片之间的联系
item.description: Celestial AI 是硅谷几家芯片初创公司之一，旨在破解人工智能中的一个关键速度制约因素。【原文：Celestial AI, one of several Silicon Valley chip startups aiming to crack a key speed constraint in artificial intelligence, said on Tuesday it has raised an additional $250 million in venture capital, bringing its total raised to date to $515 million.】

item.title: 加拿大关税引发价格波动，中国收紧贸易规则
item.description: 郑州商品交易所周二将部分菜籽粕期货合约的交易保证金要求从7%提高到9%，此前中国政府对加拿大进口菜籽粕征收100%的关税，引发了为期两天的反弹，将价格推高至五个月高点。【原文：Zhengzhou Exchange on Tuesday raised the trading margin requirements for some rapeseed meal futures contracts to 9% from 7% after Beijing's 100% tariff on Canadian imports triggered a two-day rally that pushed prices to a five-month high.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Zolve 在迄今为止最大的一轮融资中获得 2.51 亿美元融资
item.description: Zolve 新银行周二表示，在最新一轮股权和债务融资中筹集了 2.51 亿美元，由现有投资者印度私募股权公司 Creaegis 领投，汇丰银行和 SBI Investment 等机构参投。【原文：Zolve raised $251 million in its latest equity and debt financing round, the neo bank said on Tuesday, led by Indian private equity firm Creaegis, an existing investor, with participation from names like HSBC and SBI Investment.】

item.title: 美国航空公司预计第一季度亏损扩大
item.description: 由于担心关税压力和政府支出的不确定性会抑制旅游需求，美国航空公司周二预测第一季度亏损将扩大。【原文：American Airlines on Tuesday forecast a bigger first-quarter loss, amid concerns that tariff pressures and government spending uncertainties could dampen travel demand.】

item.title: 印度 Bharti Airtel 公司与 SpaceX 公司签署协议，为印度提供 Starlink 互联网服务
item.description: 印度巴帝电信公司（Bharti Airtel）周二表示，该公司已与 SpaceX 公司签署协议，将在印度引入 Starlink 互联网。【原文：India's Bharti Airtel said on Tuesday that it has signed a deal with SpaceX to bring Starlink internet in India.】

item.title: 零售商科尔（Kohl's）预计全年销售额降幅大于预期
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's Corp）周二预计全年可比销售额的降幅将超过预期，这给新任老板阿什利-布坎南（Ashley Buchanan）带来了更大的压力，因为他正在努力扭转这家因需求不均衡而陷入困境的美国连锁百货公司的局面。【原文：Kohl's Corp forecast a bigger drop in annual comparable sales than expected on Tuesday, piling on more pressure on new boss Ashley Buchanan as he engineers a turnaround at the U.S. department store chain struggling with uneven demand.】

item.title: 西南航空公司下调第一季度单位收入增长预期
item.description: 由于担心关税压力和政府支出的不确定性会影响国内旅游需求，西南航空公司周二下调了单位收入增长预期。【原文：Southwest Airlines cut its unit revenue growth forecast on Tuesday, as concerns over discretionary spending amid tariff pressures and government spending uncertainties affect domestic travel demand.】

item.title: 美国 华尔街史诗般的暴跌抹去了特朗普的涨幅
item.description: 美国早报【原文：Morning Bid U.S.】

item.title: 西南航空转向付费行李政策以提高收益
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周二表示，该公司将开始向部分乘客收取托运行李费用，结束独特的免费政策，同时该公司也在寻找支撑其盈利的方法。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Tuesday it would start charging some customers for checked bags, ending a unique free policy, as the company looks for ways to shore up its earnings.】

item.title: 西南航空转向付费行李政策以提高收益
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周二表示，该公司将开始向部分乘客收取托运行李费用，结束独特的免费政策，同时该公司正在寻找支撑其盈利的方法。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Tuesday it would start charging some customers for checked bags, ending a unique free policy, as the company looks for ways to shore up its earnings.】

item.title: 宝莹所有者汉高称美国政策损害了北美市场
item.description: 消费品和粘合剂生产商汉高周二表示，美国政府的决定对北美市场造成了极大的伤害，这是最新一家就唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策所带来的不确定性发出警告的公司。【原文：U.S. government decisions are hurting the North American market disproportionately, consumer goods and adhesive maker Henkel said on Tuesday, the latest company to warn about uncertainty caused by President Donald Trump's trade policies.】

item.title: 华尔街大跌后期货走高，就业数据值得期待
item.description: 继华尔街主要股指在上一交易日创下今年最大单日跌幅之后，周二美国股指期货在当天晚些时候的就业数据公布前小幅上扬。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched up on Tuesday following this year's biggest one-day drop for Wall Street's main indexes in the previous session, ahead of jobs data later in the day.】

item.title: 美国汽车买家争相前往经销商处，以避免与关税相关的价格上涨
item.description: 马修-米切尔（Matthew Mitchell）听说美国总统唐纳德-特朗普真的要对墨西哥和加拿大征收 25% 的关税后，他告诉妻子是时候抢购一辆汽车了，而且要快。【原文：After Matthew Mitchell heard U.S. President Donald Trump was serious about implementing 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada, he told his wife it was time to snatch up a car, and fast.】

item.title: 特朗普会见美国企业界人士，经济担忧打压股市
item.description: 预计总统将与约 100 位首席执行官发表讲话。【原文：The president is expected to speak with around 100 CEOs.】

item.title: 独家报道：Meta 开始测试其首个内部人工智能训练芯片
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，Facebook 的所有者 Meta 正在测试其第一款用于训练人工智能系统的内部芯片，这是该公司迈向设计更多自己的定制芯片、减少对 Nvidia 等外部供应商依赖的一个重要里程碑。【原文：Facebook owner Meta is testing its first in-house chip for training artificial intelligence systems, a key milestone as it moves to design more of its own custom silicon and reduce reliance on external suppliers like Nvidia , two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普焦虑情绪加深，美国散户投资者警惕买入跌势
item.description: 对特朗普关税将引发经济衰退的担忧正在推动股市抛售。【原文：Fears that Trump’s tariffs will spark an economic downturn are driving a sell-off in equities.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税给威斯康星州的工厂车间带来了 "狂野的西部"。
item.description: 阿里恩斯公司（AriensCo）是一家生产鲜艳橙色吹雪机的公司，自 11 月份以来，该公司一直在为关税寒流做准备。【原文：AriensCo - a manufacturer of bright orange snowblowers - has braced for the cold blast of tariffs since November.】

item.title: 2 月份美国小型企业信心指数跌幅扩大
item.description: 由于对美国政府贸易政策的担忧与日俱增，2 月份美国小企业信心连续第三个月下降，抹去了唐纳德-特朗普总统 11 月赢得大选后取得的大部分涨幅。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence dropped for a third straight month in February, wiping away much of the gains notched in the aftermath of President Donald Trump's election victory in November, amid mounting concerns over the administration's trade policy.】

item.title: Coinbase 在印度金融监管部门注册，提供加密货币交易服务
item.description: 总部位于美国的加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global 周二表示，该公司已在印度金融情报机构（FIU）注册，允许在印度提供加密货币交易服务。【原文：U.S.-headquartered cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global has registered with India's Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU), allowing it to offer crypto trading services in the country, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 达美航空下调预期令投资者恐慌，美国航空股暴跌
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）下调了利润预期，激起了人们对美国经济疲软对旅行造成的冲击的担忧，美国主要航空公司的股票在周二的盘前交易中大幅下跌。【原文：Shares of major U.S. airlines slumped in premarket trading on Tuesday after Delta Air Lines slashed its profit forecast, stoking concerns about the hit to travel from a weakening U.S. economy.】
